thread.title: BRIEF-Computer Task Group Says Entered Into Amendment Agreement Amending Credit And Security Agreement

title: BRIEF-Computer Task Group Says Entered Into Amendment Agreement Amending Credit And Security Agreement

organizations.name: brief-computer task group says entered into amendm
credit and security agreement reuters staff

text:
April 13, 2018 / 6:41 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Computer Task Group Says Entered Into Amendment Agreement Amending Credit And Security Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 13 (Reuters) - Computer Task Group Inc: 
* COMPUTER TASK GROUP SAYS CO ENTERED INTO FIRST AMENDMENT AGREEMENT AMENDING CREDIT AND SECURITY AGREEMENT DATED DECEMBER 21, 2017 - SEC FILING 
* COMPUTER TASK GROUP - AMENDMENT AMENDS RESTRICTED PAYMENTS OF CREDIT AGREEMENT DURING ANY PERIOD OF 24 CONSECUTIVE MONTHS ENDING ON OR PRIOR APRIL 13 Source text: ( bit.ly/2HiRXMu ) Further company coverage:
